title: Bought prodcuts with a credit card, should I destroy them ? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: zad from [Music] Bangladesh so I bought some products to start a business online with a credit card and I forgot about the ruling of credit cards so what should I do with the products now should I destroy them or did you pay on time or did riba occur on it that uh credit card was my friend's fathers because I don't have one no no the the the the merchandise you bought is halal you can sell it and you can make a profit of it but next time don't do that
